data.text: @Amy__Macdonald Not so easy for us to re arrange or afford!

@Amy__Macdonald Myself and a friend were flying out from London to Vienna to see you tomorrow . Can't cancel flights and hotel now. We cant make the postponed date. The organizer of the event will only provide a voucher which can only be used in Austria which we cannot use! Can you help?🙁
@Amy__Macdonald Are there tickets available for this gig? Definitly want to go to one of your tour, yesterday after three years waitin' cant go due to positive test 😫😭
@Amy__Macdonald Come to birmingham on Friday. Just bring your guitar😃

@Amy__Macdonald So, thank you to rescheduled this on the national holiday of Belgium, ‘cause I will have a week off then..
But feel gutted also, I can’t cancel my hotel/ flight/ travels… 😢
@Amy__Macdonald Yo should come to Ecuador, there's no restriction jeje
@Amy__Macdonald That's an unfortunate bit of timing, but you have at least got a new date, just like with the Hydro, it'll still happen, just later than planned... ❤️

(2/2) Absolutely gutted as we were so excited to hit Vienna on Friday, but it’s completely out of our hands 😔 New date is 21st July 2022, and all tickets remain valid, looking forward to seeing you all then instead!
